Package com.fortify.pub.serialization

Utility classes for safe Java object deserialization.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassNameMatcher
    An object that matches a Class name to a condition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeserializableClass<T>
    Specification for safely de-serializable class.
    DynamicDeserializableClass<T>
    Specification for safely de-serializable class names, where whitelisted classes can be updated on runtime.
    DynamicDeserializableClass.DynamicMatcher  
    FileBasedClassNameMatcher
    A ClassNameMatcher that matches list of class names loaded from a file found on classpath.
    FullClassNameMatcher
    A ClassNameMatcher that matches on full class names.
    ValidatingObjectInputStream
    An ObjectInputStream that's restricted to deserialize a limited set of classes.
    ValidatingObjectReader<T>
    A wrapper for ValidatingObjectInputStream and DeserializableClass simplifying safe Java object de-serialization.

Package com.fortify.pub.serialization Description

Utility classes for safe Java object deserialization.
